lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: What is this place? What's burning?

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: I have scanned and surveillance the area here. We are safe here for the time being. You can rest here by the campfire, or make modifications to your deck.

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: ....What is happening right now? Where even am I right now?

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: Well this is a good time to explain our situation.

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: We are in cyberspace of your device. This is not just a normal cyberspace, this is a virtual cyberspace created by an unknown software found in this device.

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: A software? How did it get into my pc?

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: I dont know. I detected the unknown software a while ago, and then I was shut off. After that I awoken with no memory, and you infront of me.

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: Do you have any idea of this mysterious occurance?

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: I may or may not installed a game from a uhhhh website.

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: You have installed a unknown program from an untrustworthy distributor?!

lines.speaker: Student
lines.text: It is a free game, how can I not pass that offer?

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: Even if it is not an offical program or from a distributor? Now there are viruses and malwares scattering in your device.

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: Do you have any idea what you have done?

lines.speaker: Kortica
lines.text: We should be on the move. We can not stay here any longer, rest up or fix your deck.
